definitions.definition: The chemical element ( symbol Ar) with an atomic number of 18. The third most abundant gas in the Earth's atmosphere , it is a colourless , odourless , inert noble gas .
A single atom of this element.

main_definition: The chemical element ( symbol Ar) with an atomic number of 18. The third most abundant gas in the Earth's atmosphere , it is a colourless , odourless , inert noble gas .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A single atom of this element.
